about_me.des: I am a Android Application Development Engineer at present,And I was a Android Source Development Engineer as I worked for a IDH(Independent Design House) company two years ago. I think life is a process of learning and serving, not only on the materials, but also on the spiritual aspect. there are three things deep inside me: Faith, Love, Hope. Faith is the source where confidence comes, and love is the instrument overcome difficulties and obstacles, live with hope, I would not hesitate go forward!

projects.overlapviewpager: OverlapViewPager is a simple customized ViewGroup which works like a overlap viewpager, there three pages:left、middle、right.

career.huadong_des: Now I am in HuaDong Media,take the position of senior engineer，and the responsibility for development of application which has more than one million DAU.
career.sand_des: In Sand, I took the responsibility for development of application which helps field staffs to fulfill their tasks, kind of management software.
career.dewav_des: In Dewav, which is a well known IDH company, I started to deal with android source code.
career.college_des: At July 2012,I graduated from college and started my Android technology tour.
